scripts.secrets:linux: echo Enter Bitwarden Password: && read BW_PASSWORD && (npx bw logout || exit 0) && export BW_SESSION=`npx bw login product@bitsofgood.org $BW_PASSWORD --raw` && npm run secrets:get
scripts.secrets:windows: set /p BW_PASSWORD=Enter Bitwarden Password:&& (npx bw logout || VER>NUL) && npm run secrets:login
scripts.secrets:login: FOR /F %a IN ('npx bw login product@bitsofgood.org %BW_PASSWORD% --raw') DO SET BW_SESSION=%a && npm run secrets:get
scripts.secrets:get: npx bw sync && npx bw get item 75f3d8bf | npx fx .notes > ".env"
